QuestData.Title: Powering the Defenses
QuestData.Description: It's good to see a Horde champion joining the fight.$B$BAuchindoun's defenses are faltering quickly. The few Auchenai soulpriests not on the front are working fervently to maintain them.$B$BSoulbinder Tuulani went inside the nearby Tomb of Lights to retrieve a backup power pylon and hasn't returned. If you can find her and get her and the pylon back here safely it would help greatly.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find Soulbinder Tuulani in the Tomb of Lights.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Find Soulbinder Tuulani in the Tomb of Lights.
QuestData.RewardText: You look like you can fight. We need to get out of here!
